channel.title: Game crashes when loading bm_c3a1b.bsp
channel.description:
Hi!
I have a curious problem. I have the typicall graphic problems with de purple an black texture, but a part of that, the game used to work perfectly.
The problem is that [b]in the chapter FORGET ABOUT FREEMAN[/b], when I have to climb the stairs to go to the surface, on the loading time, [b]the game just stays eternally loading.[/b]
5:50
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sCZgEKnKL8&feature=related[/url]
[b]I've tried to load that part with the console, the map is bm_c3a1b[/b], but it just doesn't work. It works with all the other maps that I've tried. I can go to the next map "lambda core" but if it's possible, I don't want a miss a part of the game.
Is there someone else with the same problem?
Any idea of what is happening?
Thank you

item.title: Game crashes when loading bm_c3a1b.bsp
item.dc:creator: Yuri_kalashnikov
item.description:
Hi!

I have a curious problem. I have the typicall graphic problems with de purple an black texture, but a part of that, the game used to work perfectly.

The problem is that in the chapter FORGET ABOUT FREEMAN, when I have to climb the stairs to go to the surface, on the loading time, the game just stays eternally loading.

5:50

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sCZgEKnKL8&feature=related

I’ve tried to load that part with the console, the map is bm_c3a1b, but it just doesn’t work. It works with all the other maps that I’ve tried. I can go
to the next map “lambda core” but if it’s possible, I don’t want a miss a part of the game.

Is there someone else with the same problem?

Any idea of what is happening?

Thank you

Read full topic
